forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 12C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 53F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low 39F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 54F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 8C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 46F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 14C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 58F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 12C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 50 to 75mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 54F. Winds SE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 2 to 3 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High near 15C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected. Flooding is possible in flood prone areas.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 59F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected. Flooding is possible in flood prone areas.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 12C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm. Flooding is possible in flood prone areas.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 54F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch. Flooding is possible in flood prone areas.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Flooding is possible in flood prone areas.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Flooding is possible in flood prone areas.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 9C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Flooding is possible in flood prone areas.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 49F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Flooding is possible in flood prone areas.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Flooding is possible in flood prone areas.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 57F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Flooding is possible in flood prone areas.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 11C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 52F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 58F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 46F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 13C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High around 55F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High around 55F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.
